name: Claude Code Plugin Manager
description: Manage Claude Code built-in plugins at project scope. Activate or deactivate plugins per devcontainer environment.

activate_plugins.description: List of plugins to activate (e.g., ['superpowers', 'tdd']). Plugin names are resolved to their full 'name@marketplace' identifiers automatically.

deactivate_plugins.description: List of plugins to deactivate (e.g., ['autopilot', 'ralph']). Takes priority over activate list for conflicting entries.
